thread.section_title: Waldorf Astoria Beijing - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Best hotel of my life
thread.title_full: Best hotel of my life - Review of Waldorf Astoria Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: L222FFjuanm
title: Best hotel of my life
text: The Waldorf Astoria alone is worth the trip to Beijing. The hotel is spotless with the most luxurious accommodations I've ever seen in a hotel. The staff is top notch and very helpful. The location is ideal and the food on-site is some of the best fine-dining I've ever eaten.
